channel.title: Recetas on Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Recetas on Recipes

item.title: almond horchata
item.description: 1/2 cup of almonds 1 1/2 cups of hot water 2 cups of luke warm water 1/2 cup of sugar Steep the almonds in hot water for 5 minutes to remove their shell. Proceed with the previous recipe. Serve very cold and garnish with a cherry.

item.title: bacon-stuffed eggs
item.description: 12 hard-boiled eggs 1 teaspoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper 3 slices of bacon 1/2 cup grated cheese 2 cups bechamel Split the eggs in two each. Mash the buds. Fry the bacon and break into small pieces. Add to the mashed yolks, season with salt and pepper and fill the egg halves. Mix the white sauce with the cheese, pour over the stuffed eggs and serve.

item.title: baked chicken with duchess puree
item.description: RECIPE1 1 chicken salt at ease pepper cognac a quarter pound of butter RECIPE2 2 pounds of potatoes water salt to taste half a pound of butter pepper grated nutmeg 2 egg yolks a quarter of milk cream 6 tablespoons grated cheese RECIPE1 Clean the chicken, go, wash it and dry it, season it with salt, spray the cog√±ac and place it in the mold you are going to use for roasting.

item.title: baked plantains
item.description: 4 ripe plantains 1-2 pounds of cheese broken into long slices butter Peel the plantains. Once peeled cut down center. Bake, after filling with cheese, in a mold with butter. Once golden, prepare a white syrup and serve.

item.title: barley soda
item.description: 6 glasses 4 cups of hot water 4 tablespoons barley powder 1 cup sugar 1 1-2 teaspoons juice lemon Mix the barley with a little cold water, add the hot water and boil for a few minutes, stirring constantly. Strain the barley, add the sugar and lemon juice. Serve very cold.

item.title: bean omelette
item.description: 1 pound of beans 2 crumbled chorizos 3 beaten eggs 1 teaspoon grated onion 1-4 teaspoon pepper butter Soften the beans and mash them. Add the other ingredients and mix. Put enough butter in the pan to cover the bottom. Pour into the pan, cover and simmer, come back and brown on both sides.

item.title: beef a la parisienne
item.description: 1 1/2 pounds steak meat (beefsteak) 2 cloves of garlic 1 teaspoon salt 3/4 teaspoon pepper black powder 1 teaspoon lemon juice 1 teaspoon cider vinegar 1/2 teaspoon powders chili 1 teaspoon split oregano leaves 2 8-ounce cans of tomato sauce Cut the meat into 4 servings. Mash the garlic and mix with the salt and pepper. Adobe the meat with this everywhere. Combine lemon juice and vinegar, chili powders and oregano.

item.title: brain pudding
item.description: 1 brain 2 beaten eggs 4 tablespoons of breadcrumbs 6 tablespoons grated cheese 2 tablespoons butter 1 teaspoon salt 1-8 teaspoon pepper Boil the brain, mash and strain through a cheesecloth. Add the eggs, bread, cheese, butter, salt and pepper. Season it to taste and pour it into a greased mold. Bake at a temperature of 350 degrees F for 30 minutes.

item.title: brain sandwiches
item.description: 1 large brain 200 grams of flour 2 egg yolk milk Prepare a large brain, removing the skin and cooking it in water and salt drain it and cut it into pieces. Put in a bowl the flour, yolks and milk in sufficient quantity to form a soft preparation mix well, add the brains, fry them by tablespoons in hot oil and over moderate heat.

item.title: breaded meat medallions
item.description: 2 pounds of ground beef 1 grated onion 1/2 tablespoon salt 1/4 teaspoon pepper powder 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg 4 eggs 1 1/2 cup cookie powder frying fat 8 toasted bread medallions mustard sauce Place the meat in a bowl and add the onion, salt, pepper and nutmeg. Integrate well add 2 eggs, integrating each one ligating well. Add cracker meal to give consistency to the dough, but it should still be soft.

item.title: chard salad
item.description: 2 mallets of chards 2 cups of water 1 tablespoon of salt 1/2 cup of oil 1/4 cup of vinegar 1 teaspoon of salt 1/4 teaspoon of pepper Wash and boil the chards, for no more than 5 minutes, in pieces and mix in the oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Garnish with rings of onions and tomato.

item.title: chayote with cream
item.description: 4 chayotes 4 tablespoons cornstarch 3-4 cup sugar 2 egg yolks 1 cup milk 1 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons raisins 2 tablespoons melted butter 1-2 cup cracker meal Split the chayotes lengthwise and boil. When they are soft take out the pulp and mash well. Beat the yolks with the sugar, add salt, and cornstarch, milk, mashed chayotes, butter and potatoes Put on the fire and cook until thickened like a cream Fill the rinds with the cream and sprinkle cinnamon on top.

item.title: chocolate delight
item.description: 1-2 liter of milk 1 cup grated coconut 6 beaten egg yolks 2 tablespoons cornstarch 5 tablespoons grated chocolate 6 tablespoons powdered sugar Soak the coconut with milk to moisten. In a bowl mix the coconut with yolks, cornstarch and chocolate. Beat and a little by little the sugar and milk, pour in a saucepan and cook over low heat. In order for it not to adhere to the bottom of the saucepan it must be continuously moved.

item.title: cocada
item.description: 2 cups dulce de coco 2 tablespoons melted butter 2 beaten eggs 2 ounces peeled almonds Add the butter and eggs to the dulce de coco. Pour into a flat greased mold. Garnish with almonds. Bake over moderate heat for 20 minutes.

item.title: cod a la biscayan
item.description: 1 pound of cod 1-2 cup olive oil 2 sliced onions 1-2 cup tomato sauce 1-2 cup olives 1 tablespoon capers 2 cloves of garlic 1 pound sliced potatoes 2 roasted ripe peppers 1-4 cup raisins Put the cod in hot water, remove the skin and thorns and cut into medium-sized pieces. In a casserole put litters of cod, onions and potatoes, tomato sauce, olives, capers and raisins, garlic and strips of peppers.

item.title: corncakes
item.description: 2 cups corn flour 4 cups of water 1 teaspoon salt 1 pound of pork 1 onion 2 ounces of ham 3 tablespoons lard 1 pepper 1 tomato 1 teaspoon salt lard Prepare a hard funche using flour, water and salt. Grind the other ingredients into the machine and add the salt. Simmer. Season at ease. On a greased banana leaf, pour two tablespoons of funche and spread it in a circle.

item.title: creamy pumpkin soup
item.description: 3 cups of mashed pumpkin 3 cups bechamel sauce 1 small onion, grated Add onion and bechemel sauce to mashed pumpkin. Bring to a boil and season at ease. Strain and or broth. Serve callente with crackers or toasted bread.

item.title: creole beef gumbo
item.description: 1 cup celery with its leaves, cut 2 tablespoons butter 2 1/2 cups chopped tomato 8 cups of water 1 1/4 cup rice 1 1/2 cups onion, chopped fine 1 tablespoon sugar 4 teaspoons salt 1/2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce Saut√© the celery in butter for 3 minutes. Put the tomato and water. Bring to a boil, pour the onion, sugar, salt and English sauce. Bring to a boil for 30 minutes.

item.title: floating island
item.description: 3 heaping tablespoons of cornstarch 3-4 liters of milk (use more milk for thinner cream) vanilla essence 4 very beaten egg whites 4 egg yolks 1-2 cup sugar Beat the egg whites to the point of consistent meringue. Boil the milk with vanilla. Add the preparation of the whites by tablespoons and let them cook for a few minutes. Remove the meringue flakes and drain them on a strainer. Strain the milk, beat the yolks with the sugar and add the warm milk and the previously dissolved cornstarch.

item.title: frog legs a la B√©arnaise
item.description: 8 very fresh frog legs Go out at ease Pepper to taste Oil 3 fresh tomatoes 1 cup white wine Lemon juice (in abundance) The legs are seasoned well and saut√©ed with the oil. Then add the chopped fresh tomato and white wine and lemon juice. Let cool with some fine chopped herbs. Serve in shells.

item.title: gazpacho
item.description: 1 clove of garlic 1-4 teaspoon peppercorns 1-2 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons of oil 4 cups of water 2 tablespoons vinegar 4 chopped tomatoes 2 chopped onions 2 chopped pickles 2 peppers, chopped Grind the garlic along with the pepper, salt and add the oil, water and vinegar. Strain and add to chopped vegetables. Put in the fridge for several hours and add slices of bread before serving.

item.title: grilled lobster
item.description: 1 3-pound lobster butter salt and pepper to taste Cut the lobster lengthwise without removing the shell. Remove the stomach and intestines. Place each half on the grill, resting on the shell. Spread butter and sprinkle with pepper to taste. Simmer for 40 minutes. Serve hot with melted butter.

item.title: gypsy eggs
item.description: regular amount of oil two garlic 10 or 12 peeled almonds a little piece of bread a few strands of saffron 1-2 teaspoons of cumin a little cinnamon powder boiling water salt 7 eggs In a regular amount of oil we will start by frying two garlic, 10 or 12 peeled almonds, a piece of bread, removing when it is browned. In an almirez you start by crushing a few strands of saffron 1-2 teaspoon of cumin, a little cinnamon powder then the garlic, almonds and bread, soaking with drops of the same oil.

item.title: Italian rice
item.description: 1-2 pound chopped onions 4 tablespoons butter 4 ounces of broken ham 3 split tomatoes 3 split anchovies 1-1-2 pounds of rice 3 cups chicken broth 1 minced chicken breast 1-2 cup grated parmesan cheese Brown the onions and add the ham, tomatoes, anchovies, and saut√©. Add the rice, stir and saut√©. Add the broth and chicken. When the rice is almost dry, add the cheese, stir, pour into a grease mold and sprinkle with ground cracker.

item.title: jackfruit pancakes
item.description: 2 cups boiled jackfruit 2 tablespoons butter 1-2 teaspoon salt 2 tablespoons grated cheese 1 beaten egg Mash the jackfruit, add the salt and butter and mix well. Add the egg, salt and cheese Shape it into small cakes and fry in hot, hearty butter.

item.title: liver fillets
item.description: liver fillets flour salt oil a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter a glass of Marsala wine cooked spinach lard cooked potatoes Cut some liver fillets by touching the telita and nerves and pass them through flour and season with salt. Put in a frying pan half a cup of oil, heat well and brown the encores then add a bay leaf, 50 grams of butter, a glass of Marsala wine, cover and let it boil slowly until the fillets are cooked and the sauce reduced.

item.title: macaroni and Vienna sausages
item.description: 1-2 pound macaroni 1-2 pounds of grated American cheese 2 cups white sauce 2 cans of Vienna sausages Cook the macaroni in plenty of salt water, until soft. Remove from heat, drain them and pour warm water again. Drain again. Make a white sauce with the recipe we offer you lower, and add the grated cheese. Cut into wheels several sausages, leaving 6 whole for adornment. Combine the macaroni, sauce, and sausage slices.

item.title: macaroni with sobreasada
item.description: 1 pound of macaroni 8 cups of water 2 tablespoons salt 1-4 pound of broken ham 1-2 cup oil 2 split onions 1 clove of crushed garlic 1-4 pound of oversized des menuzada 1 can of tomato paste 1 cup water Boil the macaroni in salted water and drain them after cooking. Fry the ham in the oil and add the other ingredients Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the macaroni and stir.

item.title: marengo chicken
item.description: 1 tender chicken (about 1-1-2 kilos), broken into 4 pieces 1-2 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons cognac 1 medium onion, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 cup dry white wine 1 cube of chicken bouill√≥n 1-4 cup mashed tomatoes 3 sprigs of parsley 1 pinch of dried thyme 1 bay leaf, small 200 grams of fresh mushrooms slices 1 cup toasted croutons Pieces of po are sprayed llo, including the menudos, with sai and pepper.

item.title: oatmeal soda
item.description: 3-4 cup oatmeal 7 cups of water 1 cup sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla Put the oatmeal in the water for an inedia hour and strain. Sweeten and add the vanilla. Serve very cold garnished with lemon wedges.

item.title: orange cake
item.description: 2 packets of orange-flavored gelatin 2 cups boiling water 1 3-4 cup orange juice fresh fruit Dissolve the gelatin in the boiling water. Add the orange juice. Pour into a 1 liter capacity thread mold and cool until firm. Remove from the pan and pour into a serving plate. In the center of the mold, place fresh fruit.

item.title: orange cakes
item.description: 300 grams of flour 150 grams of sugar 2 teaspoon baking powder half a teaspoon of salt half a teaspoon of baking soda 100 grams of butter 1 orange Pass through a sifter 300 grams of flour, 150 of sugar, 2 teaspoons filled with baking powder, half salt and a half baking soda. Mix a cup of orange juice with the zest of an orange, 100 grams of barely melted butter, a beaten egg and add it to the other ingredients put in a buttered and floured mold do and cook like the previous ones.

item.title: orange punch
item.description: 6 egg yolks 1 cup sugar 4 cups orange juice 6 egg whites Beat the yolks and sugar together. Add the juice to the yolks mix well and strain. Serve very cold garnished with the meringue.

item.title: panetela portena
item.description: 1 panetela 1 glass of rum 8 tablespoons grated coconut do 10 candied cherries 1 kilogram of dulce de leche The panetela is cut into layers fine and sprinkled with rum, covering with dulce de leche. It is formed again and covered above and around with the same sweet. It sticks striped coconut around and is decorated on top with the rest of the sweet. Garnish with candied cherries split in half.

item.title: peasant stew
item.description: 1 cup chickpeas 1 cup peas 3 red chorizos 1 teaspoon oregano 2 bay leaflets 1 sprig of parsley 1 onion 1 pepper oil salt Chickpeas and peas are left to soak from the day before, after washing them well. They are brought to a boil in the same water in which they have dawned. When they take point, the bay leaf, oregano, parsley are added, the onion and peppers are chopped and saut√©ed in oil with a pinch of salt and this is added along with the chorizos in pieces.

item.title: potato cake
item.description: 2 pounds of potatoes 1 teaspoon salt 2 beaten eggs 4 tablespoons flour 2 cups minced meat filling Boil and mash the potatoes. Add salt, eggs, and flour. Divide into two portions. Put a part in a greased mold so that it shakes the entire mold. Pour the picadillo and spread it and rub with the rest of the potatoes. Cook in a moderate oven at 350 degrees F for 30 or 40 minutes.

item.title: potato cream soup
item.description: 6 tablespoons butter 2 teaspoons salt 1-4 teaspoon pepper 3 tablespoons tri flour go 6 cups of hot milk 1 tablespoon grated onion 2 cups mashed potatoes Prepare the bechamel by melting the butter. Add salt, pepper and flour and stir until it forms a pass. Pour the hot milk and onion and move constantly. When it boils add the mashed potatoes. Serve hot.

item.title: potato fritters
item.description: 1 1-2 pounds of potatoes 1 tablespoon salt 2 eggs 1 cup grated cheese 1-2 pound butter Boil and mash the potatoes. Add the eggs and cheese and fry in butter.

item.title: potato salad
item.description: 6 cups cooked potatoes and diced 1 1/2 cup chopped celery 6 tablespoons pepper, chopped 3/4 cup Kraft Mayonnaise 1 tablespoon of onion or garlic salt if you prefer freshly ground pepper lettuce hard-boiled eggs 7 slices of sausage 6 tablespoons tomato dressing Stir the potatoes, celery and pepper with the mayonnaise. Salt and pepper are added to taste. Put a mound of salad on arranged lettuce on a plate.

item.title: pumpkin pur√©e
item.description: 6 cups broth 1-2 pound split pumpkin in pieces 2 tablespoons flour 1 tablespoon mantequi at Boil the pumpkin in the broth. Strain and mash the pumpkin, mix the flour with a little cold broth, add the butter and put on the fire, stirring constantly and add the rest of the broth. Season to taste and serve warm.

item.title: rice croquettes
item.description: 2 cups cooked white rice 1/4 teaspoon salt 1 beaten egg 1/2 teaspoon pepper 2 tablespoons chopped parsley 3 tablespoons of milk 1 cup cracker meal or toast Add egg, pepper, salt, parsley, and milk to cooked rice. Form the croquettes and sprinkle with the cracker meal. Fry them in hot and abundant butter and drain them on absorbent paper. Cheese can be used instead of parsley.

item.title: rice with sausages
item.description: sofrito 5 split sausages 1 1-2 pounds of rice 1 teaspoon salt 3 tablespoons butter with annotto 3 cups water Add the sausages, rice and butter with sofrito and cook for two minutes. Add the water and season to taste. Cook until the rice is a little dry, lower the heat, stir two or three times and keep covered until serving.

item.title: roast chicken
item.description: 1 3 lbs. chicken cut into pieces wheat flour, salt and pepper frying fat 1-1-2 cups sifted flour 1 1-2 teaspoon powder baking 1 teaspoon salt 4 eggs 1 1-2 cup milk 3 tablespoons butter or fortified margarine, melt gives black pepper Put the chicken pieces in a cartridge, with flour, salt and pepper, and shake the cartridge so that the pieces are well covered with flour. In a large skillet, endow the chicken on both sides, in hot fat.

item.title: Salvadorean rice and chicken
item.description: 2 cups rice coarse salt 5 cups of hot water 1 bay leaf 1 lemon husk lemon juice 6 poultry livers lard 1-2 onion in fine julienne 1 glass of marsala wine 1 pinch of salt 1 pinch of black pepper 1 pinch of cinnamon 2 teaspoons rice starch 1 cup warm milk Put in a clay pot the rice with the salt, water, bay leaf, a piece of lemon peel and a little lemon juice.

item.title: seafood salad
item.description: 1 can of salmon 3 cooked potatoes 2 hard-boiled eggs 6 green and 6 black olives thin slices of onion lettuce leaves 1-2 cup oil 1 teaspoon salt the juice of a lemon 1 tomato in a dish, lettuce leaves, on top of thinly sliced potatoes, onion, salmon season with salt, oil and lemon and garnish with tomato, hard-boiled egg slices and olives.

item.title: serenade
item.description: 1 pound of cod 1 sliced onion olives to taste 2 sliced tomatoes French sauce Put the cod in water for a few hours to remove some of the salt Boil, remove the skin and thorns and cut into small pieces. Place the cod in a bowl and garnish with tomato wheels, onions and olives. Pour the French sauce. Serve with other boiled foods: banana, sweet potato, potatoes, etc.

item.title: simple spaghetti sauce
item.description: 1 chopped onion 1/4 cup of oil 4 garlic cloves 1 cup of tomato sauce 1 can of tomatoes 1 bay leaf 1 teaspoon of sugar 1 teaspoon of salt 1/2 teaspoon of ground pepper Fry the onion in the oil. Add the other ingredients and simmer until it thickens, approximately half an hour. Mash and strain.

item.title: sparkling coffee soda
item.description: 1 1-2 cups of packed cold coffee 1 to 2 tablespoons of sugar 1-2 teaspoon vanilla. Fill the bowl of the electric mixer halfway with well-chopped ice. Then add 1 1 -2 cups of packed cold coffee, 1 to 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1-2 teaspoons of vanilla. Mix for about 2 or 3 minutes. Makes 4 glasses of a rich, frothy coffee drink.

item.title: stuffed chicken
item.description: 1 4-pound chicken 3 teaspoons salt 3 cloves of crushed garlic half a teaspoon of oregano powder 1 chopped onion 1-1-2 pounds of pork a quarter pound of ham 3 tablespoons butter 2 tablespoons tomato sauce 1 tablespoon raisins Marinate the chicken inside and outside several hours before filling it. Grind the ham and the pork and add the other ingredients seasoning and re llane the chicken. Thing the opening and grease it on the outside with butter.

item.title: stuffed sausage
item.description: 3-4 pounds of ground beef 3-4 pounds of ground pork 2 teaspoons salt 1-2 teaspoon nutmeg 1-4 teaspoon pepper powder 1 egg 2 egg yolks 1-4 cup cognac cracker meal 1-4 pound precooked ham cut into thin slices Place the meats in a bowl and add the salt, nutmeg and pepper. Stir until the ingredients are well mixed. The egg is added and when it is well bound, a yolk is added and after well-bound the second one is added.

item.title: sweet potato pudding
item.description: 1 pound sweet potato boiled and mashed 1-2 cup sugar 1-4 teaspoon cinnamon 1-4 cup wheat flour 1-4 cup milk 2 tablespoons butter melted 2 beaten eggs 1-4 teaspoon salt Mix the ingredients in the order they appear, beat to join them well. Pour into an engrated mold and cook in a moderate heat oven for 20 to 30 minutes.

item.title: tomatoes a la mireille
item.description: 6 tomatoes 1 onion 3 eggplants 1 garlic 1 cup white wine 3 egg yolks parsley 1 cup grated cheese cookie powder salt Tomatoes are divided into two and are emptied, seasoned with salt and pepper. They are fried with the onion cut into small pieces the eggplant in thin slices. They are sprinkled with white wine. Add the salt to taste, parsley and grated cheese. Let it cool and add the three egg yolks Tomatoes are stuffed and sprinkled with cookie powder They are placed in a mold, sprinkled with grated Parmesan cheese and au gratin in the oven for 5 minutes.

item.title: Venetian sausages
item.description: A pound of fine sausage aciete water salt three-quarters of a pound of cut and peeled potatoes butter milk one egg for each sausage redondel
